r.s: Common file and directory utility functions
r.d: Common file and directory utility functions. Path handling, temp dir/file, sorting of files, listDirs, isIncludable and more
r.n:
Bugs: * Fixed Bug #12741: Failed to test on Linux and FreeBSD [dufuz] * Fixed Bug #16425: File_Util::isAbsolute(), Windows can resolve /foo/bar as absolute [dufuz]
Features: * Implement Request #2798: function for human readable filesize conversion [cweiske] Usage: File_Util::prefixed($size, $decimals = 1, $long = false, $oldStyle = true, $useBiBytes = true)
integer $size The size to convert integer $decimals The number of decimals to use boolean $long Use long names (kilobyte) instead of short ones (kB) boolean $oldStyle If the old style should be used boolean $useBiBytes If the "BiBytes" names should be used [applies only to !$bOldStyle]
